archimate:Node.name: Vault
archimate:Node.documentation: A term used to describe cryptographically-protected secure storage that is outside a Wallet but still accessible to and/or managed by an Agent. A Vault may (but is not required to) contain a Wallet. A Vault is often used for secure storage of digital assets too large to fit into a Wallet. Encryption and decryption of the contents of the Vault is usually performed by an Agent using Private Keys stored in a Wallet.
